rows.segment_description: The Intelligent Cloud segment includes public, private, and hybrid server products and cloud services that support modern business and developers. It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, and Nuance Healthcare cloud services, as well as enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network. This segment focuses on cloud infrastructure, AI offerings, server software, and professional services to enhance productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers.

The More Personal Computing segment comprises products and services that focus on delivering personalized technology experiences. It includes Windows and Devices such as Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices, Gaming with Xbox hardware and content including Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming, and Search and news advertising through Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft News. This segment aims to enhance user engagement across devices, gaming platforms, and digital advertising.

The Productivity and Business Processes segment includes a portfolio of productivity, communication, and information services across various devices and platforms. It features Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services, LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions, and Dynamics products and cloud services including Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications. This segment focuses on AI-powered business productivity tools, professional networking, and intelligent cloud-based business solutions.
key_products_services: Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services
Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services
rows.primary_source: 10-K text snippet Productivity and Business Processes
